TopicTitle: Dual engines--only one activated at launch on runway.

Articles.Content:
I've discovered that dual engines attached to the RF-AD-B-400 are not both activated when the spacebar is pressed. I need to manually activate the second engine before takeoff.  Also, mirror symmetry does not seem to apply when adding engines to the RF-AD-B-400.  I am guessing these two issues are related.

 

Edited February 27, 2023 by Klapaucius
